message: I think it's fair to split the money 90/10. I'm willing to take a smaller share, since you're the one making the offers in the next round. What do you say?
I propose a 95/5 split.  While I value your willingness to compromise in the first round, this offer is more in line with the value of our respective positions in the game.
I understand your position, Bob, but I believe this is a fair compromise.  I'm willing to take a smaller share, but I need to see some movement from you to continue playing.
